title: Royal Ascot 2016: Day two build-up - BBC News
summary: the going is soft again after yesterday 's rain .
gates opened at the berkshire racecourse at 10:30 on wednesday 15 june .
kate and wills will join the queen at today 's races .
the feature race is the prince of wales 's stakes .

documents.title: follow all the race coverage at bbc sport
text: the queen is here , wills and kate are here , that bloke from one direction 's here and the horse racing is about to start .
radio four 's tip for the 2.30 jersey stakes is gifted master , and we 'll be back tomorrow with more stories and news in the build-up to royal ascot
in the meantime follow bbc sport 's coverage of the racing , and you can listen live to the racing on bbc berkshire .
author: Alex Regan
South Online

documents.title: young royal 's visit to ascot brilliant for future of the sport
text: `` this is the first time william and kate have been to royal ascot , but it 's particularly important for the future of the sport .
`` the queen 's love of horses is well-known , but it 's vital that younger members of the royal family become brand ambassadors for this fantastic sport . ''
author: Tim Dellor
BBC Berkshire sport editor

documents.title: celebrities flock to royal ascot in style
text: celebrities flock to royal ascot in style

documents.title: queen braves the weather with colour-coordinated brolly
text: as the royal procession begins with light showers , prince phillip shows dogged determination and has put his umbrella down but her majesty has come well prepared for the ty weather , with a colour-coordinated brolly .
the prince of wales and duchess of cornwall follow in the second carriage .
and william and kate are bringing up the rear in the fourth horse-drawn carriage .

documents.title: royal procession begins at ascot
text: the queen is dressed in a silk print dress in shades of cyclamen pink , ivory and latte with a matching hat .
we 'll post once we get them .
author: Alex Regan
South Online

documents.title: duke and duchess arrive at royal ascot
text: prince william and the duchess of cambridge have just arrived at royal ascot .
unfortunately we wo n't know about the queen 's hat until 14:00 bst .
author: Alex Regan
South Online

documents.title: rain , thunder and lightning
text: tlaloc , the god of rain , must have something against horse racing as the heavens have opened just before the royal procession in seven minutes .
we hope there are umbrellas in those horse-drawn carriages .

documents.title: today 's full race schedule
text: our friends at bbc sport have the line up for this afternoon 's racing for you .
full race schedule : ( time , race , status , distance )
14.30 the jersey stakes ( group 3 ) 7f
15.05 the queen mary stakes ( group 2 ) 5f
15.40 the duke of cambridge stakes ( group 2 ) 1m
16.20 the prince of wales 's stakes ( group 1 ) 1 ¼m
17.00 the royal hunt cup ( heritage handicap ) 1m
17.35 the sandringham stakes ( listed ) ( handicap ) 1m
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: three of the queen 's horses will run today
text: the princess royal gives an interesting insight into her mother 's commitment to horse racing in britain .
royal ascot 's history is quite well known .
but it has a history of its own as a place and in the history of thoroughbred racing in britain .
maintaining that has been in her majesty 's interest . ''
three horses owned by the queen run today as the princess royal explains , # royalascot has always been special

documents.title: let 's hope an afternoon shower wo n't reign on the queen 's parade
text: it 's just started to rain in ascot , but there are hopes that the light shower will ease before the royal procession at 14:00 bst .
unfortunately if there are showers today , bbc weather 's bee tucker predicts they will be heavy and slow-moving .
later in the week it 's a veritable smorgasbord of grey , with cloudy weather predicted on thursday and friday .

documents.title: awkward ascot interviews
text: some were star-struck , some had never heard of him .
but when one direction band member niall horan arrived at ascot today , bbc radio berkshire only managed to extract three rather awkward words from the star .
sports editor tim dellor described it as `` the most unimpressive performance '' by a celebrity that he could remember .
he might have a short memory .
last year he had a similarly brief conversation with actor damian lewis .
there were six questions and three one-word answers in a rather uncomfortable 17 seconds of radio .
if it were having an awkward-interview-off competition , niall horan 's three words surely triumph time-wise .
but damian lewis 's abruptness may well make it a tie .
either way , the curse of the awkward royal ascot interview has struck again .

documents.title: co-ordination is key at ascot
text: she does n't appear to have one at ascot today but just a reminder to always match your outfit to your umbrella .
that 's one cool lady

documents.title: maybe ascot should build bigger loos for the ladies in time for next year ?
text: this fabulous lady has been forced to use the disabled loos owing to the size of her hat .
# royalascot

documents.title: 'local racing is in good health '
text: `` eighteen of today 's runners are trained in berkshire .
a first and second in the king 's stand stakes for berkshire trainers yesterday suggested local racing is in good health .
`` the quality extends beyond the yard 's of clive cox and charlie hills though .
today nine different berkshire trainers have runners on the card .
`` mick channon and andrew balding are well known names , but there are also upcoming trainers like joseph tuite and owen burrows who will be worth keeping an eye on in the next few seasons .
`` there is no official lambourn v newmarket competition , but if there was it would be 1-0 to the valley of the racehorse after the big races on day one . ''
author: Tim Dellor
BBC Berkshire sport editor

documents.title: 'wherever the queen is , we are '
text: our reporter anoushka williams met colin and roger , two of her majesty 's green coats .
green coats you say ?
they work in a ceremonial role at royal ascot , helping the queen and the royal family throughout the event .
as you will discover , there is a huge amount of history behind the role .

documents.title: they have thought of everything at ascot !
text: hatscot !
@ twitterid @ twitterid
dr dawn you need a horse @ twitterid @ twitterid

documents.title: will radio four redress the balance in today 's ascot tips ? probably not
text: it 's the second day of ascot and japanese horse a shin hikari is tipped for glory in the 4.20 prince of wales stakes , but the grauniad is gunning for 16-1 outsider my dream boat .
but less of that , now to the economy of diminishing returns that is radio four 's racing tips .
yesterday there was not a sausage , hopefully the today programme will fair better on day two .
author: Alex Regan
South Online

documents.title: no loyalty points for the police chopper
text: in the queue for fuel at ascot .
wonder if they take nectar cards ?
`` other brands of loyalty reward cards are available '' : )

documents.title: take our tour of ascot
text: the journey from the parade ring to the racecourse itself is one that thousands and thousands of people will make this week .
have a look at what the punters will see as tim dellor takes you round the ground on a tour of royal ascot .

documents.title: wills and kate confirmed at royal ascot
text: the duke and duchess of cambridge have been confirmed as royal visitors to ascot this afternoon .
they will be in the fourth carriage in the royal procession .
yesterday the rain stopped just before the queen went down the racecourse in her carriage , with prince phillip and harry .
author: Alex Regan
South Online

documents.title: routes into the course starting to build
text: routes into the course starting to build
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: 'unimpressive performance ' from the one directions at ascot
text: `` niall from one direction was cagey when approached by bbc radio berkshire .
`` we did n't actually know who he was but i 've been informed by my producer he 's famous .
he looked like he was taking himself quite seriously and had a lot of body guards with him . ''
`` he 's not dressed properly [ for the royal enclosure ] , he 's only in a lounge suit , and he 's quite short so it 's hard to see who it actually was .
he was trying to stand up as straight as he could to give himself a bit of extra height .
`` that was the most unimpressive performance from a celebrity - who i did n't know who it was - ever . ''
author: Tim Dellor
BBC Berkshire sport editor

documents.title: ascot 's got plenty of talent
text: ant and dec are known to love their horse racing , and are usually spotted at royal ascot every year .
we managed to grab cheeky geordie dec as he entered the royal enclosure .
sports editor tim dellor even took the opportunity to try his best jokes out on him .
that side of it may need some work .

documents.title: ant and dec pose for with their wives at day two of ascot
text: ant and dec pose for with their wives at day two of ascot

documents.title: five non-runners so far on second day of royal ascot
text: the good people at royal ascot have tweeted the non-runners for today 's meet .
in the 2.30 jersey stakes - the first race of the day - kentucky connection is out .
then at the 5.00 royal hunt cup , master the world wo n't be mastering the course this afternoon .
finally the 5.35 sandringham stakes - the last race of the day - czabo , raaqy and the aptly named promised money wo n't be making appearances .
today 's non-runners : 1430 kentuckyconnection 1700 master the world 1735 czabo , raaqy , promised money # royalascot

documents.title: a little breather needed for some ascot racegoers this morning
text: a little breather needed for some ascot racegoers this morning

documents.title: what is a one direction ? and how do i get one ?
text: i 'm not a fan of the popular musics , but i 'm well informed there 's a thing called the one directions that people like .
berkshire 's editor duncan mclarty snapped one of the one directions - niall horan - walking into the queen anne enclosure with a swathe of security .
author: Alex Regan
South Online

documents.title: ant and dec announced as special guest trophy presenters
text: ascot have also released a video revealing other special guests including beverley knight , ricky wilson and james taylor .
we 're looking forward to welcoming two special guest trophy presenters to # royalascot today @ antanddec , obe ( s )

documents.title: one of the tastiest outfits from yesterday 's race
text: racegoer carly baker models a hat made out of cake created by royal cake baker fiona cairns

documents.title: the boys are back in town
text: bringing you all the latest throughout the afternoon are our resident racing correspondents tim dellor and ady williams , who are looking splendid in their finery .
you would think ady will have spent an extra 10 minutes in the mirror after gok wan 's critique yesterday .

documents.title: thursday 'biggest betting day ' of the year
text: it 's only the mid-week but thursday is swiftly approaching and betting shops are ready for 'the biggest betting day ' of the year so far , whatever that means .
according to the press association there will be £ 100m bet on ladies day tomorrow , but not only on the races .
unsurprisingly , the good people at uefa have unashamedly put the england vs wales game up against the gold cup , the biggest event in the five-day race meet .
i 'm not a betting man myself .
poor man 's mortgage , that 's what my old man used to say !
this is probably a load of promotional guff for bookies , but whatever .
author: Alex Regan
South Online

documents.title: is it a hat ? or is it a lampshade ?
text: ascot day en famille today
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid ha ha love it looking very sophisticated xx

documents.title: there was a checkpoint harry , he did n't crack a smile
text: prince harry was one of the litany of royals that were at day one of royal ascot yesterday .
there are rumblings the prince wills and the princess kate might go for a jolly at the berkshire racecourse today .
we 'll provide you with the latest updates from the royal procession at 14:00 bst .
author: Alex Regan
South Online

documents.title: pimm 's o'clock !
text: royal ascot time with the sagi team !

documents.title: one for the purists
text: six races , 114 horses and £ 790,000 of prize money up for grabs .
with the prince of wales stakes and royal hunt cup taking place this afternoon , it 's no wonder that day two of royal ascot is known as one of the best days of racing in the week .
here 's the full schedule of today 's action .

documents.title: racegoers arrive in style for day two at ascot
text: the sun is out as the gates open for day 2 of royal ascot 2016 .

documents.title: blue skies for day two
text: the sun has got its hat on for the second day at ascot ( phew ) with queues beginning to build as gates opened at 10:30 .

documents.title: mustard yellow ? salmon pink ? what will the queen be wearing today ?
text: as per usual the chattering classes are talking about one thing , what will her majesty be wearing today ?
will it be murderous red ?
scurrilous maroon ?
yesterday it was `` mustard '' yellow , according to sports editor tim dellor .
my money 's on salmon pink .
author: Alex Regan
South Online

documents.title: up and at 'em for wesley ward
text: horses belonging to trainer wesley ward are clip-clopping about in preparation for day two of the races .

documents.title: not a cloud in site , but muddy underfoot
text: it 's day two at royal ascot and the gates will shortly open at the race meet this morning ,
there are currently 15-minute delays around the site , but that is likely to get worse once the one-way road system comes in place at 10:30 bst .
although the rainfall let up for the queen 's royal procession yesterday afternoon , the morning 's downpours left parts of royal ascot rather muddy .
the course officials are `` rearranging '' the car parks accordingly .
# royalascottravel - due to muddy areas in some car parks we are rearranging some zones to make things easier .
please approach with caution .
author: Rory McAllister
BBC Berkshire travel presenter

documents.title: victory kiss for tepin
text: american mare tepin earns a big smacker on the lips after winning the opening queen anne stakes .
following the win , trainer casse said : `` i could n't even dream this - at the most remarkable place i 've been to . ''
# tepin is awesome the morning after her unforgettable performance @ twitterid yesterday .

so happy for your whole team .

documents.title: what 's a no-no at ascot ? what ady williams is wearing
text: the celebrities will be pouring in to royal ascot when the gates open once again at 1030 bst .
one of our highlights from yesterday was gok wan , whose interview with radio berkshire presenter and former footballer ady williams was as outstanding as his top hat and tails .
after being asked what not to wear during the event , gok rather enjoyed himself at ady 's expense .
it 's well worth a listen .

documents.title: no rest for the wicked
text: a horse belonging to trainer wesley ward is led back to the stables after exercising before racing on day two of royal ascot .

documents.title: odd shower not ruled out for ascot
text: weather 's simon king is predicting better prospects for ascot today - although there will an odd shower later .
prospects looking better for @ twitterid today .
while we ca n't rule out an odd shower , it 's mostly dry and bright .

documents.title: what not to wear
text: have you brushed the dust off your favourite frock to wear today ?
do n't forget - the dress code at royal ascot is very strict .
in the royal enclosure a hat must be worn , strapless dresses are banned , midriffs must be covered , and trouser suits , of full length , must match .
but despite the rules , there is plenty of room for creative sartorial expression - so do n't feel too restricted !

documents.title: 'lambourn racing is taking off '
text: if there 's one thing john mccririck knows , it 's horse racing ( although , as you can see , we could add posing for to that as well ) .
this morning , he 's been lauding the impact of berkshire trainers on international racing .
there are nine separate trainers with runners from the west berkshire village of lambourn on day two .
although you would expect them to turn up , it is only down the road after all

documents.title: start 'em young
text: the son of a horse trainer is following in his father 's footsteps .
here , jamie 's snowden 's wife lucy snaps a cute of their toddler preparing their horse for ascot .
great that we 've got one heading to royal ascot today !
# betterthannone # companion @ twitterid
ffoslas tomomow very busy

documents.title: security stepped up for royal ascot as 200 officers deployed
text: security at royal ascot has been stepped up with over 200 officers - including the armed response - patrolling the event .
security searches at entrances and on-site sniffer dogs will feature at the five-day event which began on tuesday and ends on saturday 18 june .
extra measures have been taken in the wake of recent terror attacks in europe and america .
supt jim weems from thames valley police said officers will be more visible in and around the site .
author: Sarah Lee
South Online

documents.title: first appearance for duke and duchess of cambridge expected
text: the duke and duchess of cambridge are expected to make their first appearance at royal ascot today .

bookmaker william hill said it is odds on that william and kate will join the queen in the royal procession at the famous berkshire racecourse , but there are also fears that the carriage parade could be scrapped after yesterday 's wet weather caused havoc .
the wet weather has softened the course so much so that there are odds of 4/1 that the queen 's carriage will not make it down the racecourse .

documents.title: a lot to live up to on day two
text: `` royal ascot has an uncanny knack of producing great racing stories .
`` day 2 relies on the japanese star a shin hikari producing the goods in the prince of wales 's stakes in the group 1 feature at 4:20 .
there are plenty of berkshire runners , competing against overseas hopes across the six races .
`` yesterday we enjoyed a frankie dettori flying dismount after gallileo gold won the feature .
there was lambourn trainer clive cox teaming up with jockey adam kirby , who became a father for the first time just hours earlier , to get profitable home first .
`` the meeting got off to an explosive start with the usa trained tepin storming home .
inevitably there was a ryan moore/aiden o'brien win as well .
that came in the coventry .
`` it 's been dry here at ascot overnight , but the going is still officially described as soft . ''
author: Tim Dellor
BBC Berkshire sport editor

documents.title: wake up and smell the coffee
text: berkshire sports presenter and former reading fc player ady williams has arrived to royal ascot for his second day of reporting .
first order of the day ?
a freshly brewed coffee of course .

documents.title: a mostly dry start with sunny spells
text: after yesterday 's soggy start , to racegoer 's delight it is set to be a fairly dry day with a few sunny spells developing .
however , there may be need to whip out an umbrella later as some scattered and potentially heavy showers are expected to fall .
do n't worry though - if you find yourself without cover , staff at ascot will be happy to provide you with a rain poncho to protect your finest garments .

documents.title: royal ascot : then and now
text: royal ascot is an event with a 300-year history , but it has gone through some big changes in the last 60 years .
we have got hold of some footage from british pathe of royal ascot in the 1950s and compared it to the racecourse thousands of punters will be visiting today .
the changes are remarkable , and that 's just the fashion .
author: Adam Whitty
BBC Berkshire

documents.title: day one : galileo gold wins under dettori
text: sport has a round-up of day one at royal ascot which saw the 2,000 guineas winner galileo gold score a thrilling triumph under frankie dettori in the st james 's palace stakes .

documents.title: 'exciting ' race card
text: a full day of racing lays ahead and ascot racecourse has a full preview of the events on its website .
a shin hikari leads an exciting # royalascot wednesday card .
full preview :
i 'd like to emphasize again # doping can affect offsprings # ashinhikari team # deepimpact has probab.told lies !
not the beast from the east , '' but just a # japan 's # shame # deepimpact 's # ashinhikari .

text: ascot racecourse says the going remains soft today .
the going remains soft after a dry night at ascot .
# royalascot

getting a little rusty .

what 's the stick reading .

documents.title: good morning and welcome to day two of royal ascot
text: hello and welcome to bbc berkshire 's morning coverage of the second day at royal ascot on wednesday 15 june .
sarah lee and adam whitty will be providing you with the latest coverage of sports coverage , travel updates and personal stories right up until the queen arrives .
do n't forget to share your ascot stories with us via email , facebook or twitter .
author: Sarah Lee
South Online
